attributes.action: Ban "one use" plastic - straws, bottles, packaging.  Use biodegradable paper.
attributes.background: One use plastic is getting into the oceans and causing damage, distress & death to sea creatures.  It's getting into the food chain & ends up being consumed by humans.  Biodegradable paper & cardboard can replace packaging of foods. Water bottles can be made personal & re-usable encouraging filters.
